posts.post_content:
Hi all. 

I know these are shots in the dark, but after recently acquiring a few toughies (Broad Leaf and Carolina Brights), I am hoping to unearth a new Lavender back for the run!

I know these are tough, but you miss 100% of the shots you don't take. 

AB 350
Cycle 350
Drum 350
Tolstoi

PayPal is ready to go. Thanks in advance for any help in tracking down the last 4 backs for this run!

J.R.
